import os

import pandas as pd
from pathlib import Path
source.61290250:
%%time
datadir = Path('../input/zillow-prize-1')
train = pd.read_csv(datadir / 'properties_2017.csv')
# test = pd.read_csv(datadir / 'test.csv')
# submission = pd.read_csv(datadir / 'sample_submission.csv')
source.d272bfff:
%%time

# --- save feather format ---
outdir = Path('.')
os.makedirs(str(outdir), exist_ok=True)
train.to_feather(outdir / 'train.feather')
source.cdd80655:
%%time

# --- save parquet format ---
outdir = Path('.')
os.makedirs(str(outdir), exist_ok=True)
train.to_parquet(outdir / 'train.parquet')
source.5b6b0fbe: ## Read large Dataframe 5 times faster than .csv format with feather and parquet format
